name: Pogo's Quest
description:
Take control of "Pogo" a "giant Bird-like Being" who must take on the "Mommlers" and restore order to his home-world. Pogo must jump, run, shoot and puzzle his way through each level to progress to the next.  

The game is a Re-Creation of a board game I made when I was about 8 - 10yrs old in the late 90s.

This is the first game have published.

          Default Controls:

          Movement: W, A, S, D / D Pad / Left Stick

          Jump: H,  A / Cross

          Attack: J,  X/ Square 

          Run: U, Right Shoulder Trigger 

          Shoot Weapon: K,  B / Circle

          Drop Weapon: L, Y / Triangle

          Interact: Y, Right Shoulder Button

          Aim Bomb: I, Left Shoulder Trigger
